text: Heather Kuzmich (born April 19, 1986) is an American fashion model. She lives in Chicago, Illinois, where she is studying video game design. She is best known for being a contestant of America's Next Top Model, Cycle 9, in which she was the fourth runner-up of the show. During the show, it was revealed that Kuzmich has Asperger syndrome and ADHD. ==References== ==Other websites== *Heather Kuzmich Famous people with Asperger Syndrome Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Models from Chicago
title: Heather Kuzmich
